sentences.sentence: I have been in the antechamber at the court of Poesy.
sentences.translation: 我曾在诗院的前厅里待过。

sentences.sentence: It was the most charming of all beings, it was Poesy!
sentences.translation: 他是最有魅力的人，他是诗人！

sentences.sentence: I learned to know my inward nature, my innate qualities, the relationship I had with Poesy.
sentences.translation: 我还学会了理解我的内在本性，我的内在品质，我与诗歌的关系。
